sentences.en: A self - fastening method is introduced by which a cleat - shaped crystal fixed in the swallow - tailed groove.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种在提拉法中使用的晶种劈形自紧固方法.

sentences.en: Do you generally cleat your desk at the end of each day?
sentences.cn: 一般来说.你每天工作结束后.会清理你的办工作 吗 ?
良好的健康状况有助于明晰的思想.

sentences.en: Nautical To secure or fast ( a rope, for example ) by winding on a cleat pin.
sentences.cn: 用 ( 如绳子 ) 系在楔或拴上以固定或弄牢.

sentences.en: The influence of confining pressure change and coal cleat on gas permeability is studied by experiments.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍了钏路煤层及相关割理系统的特性,通过试验研究了围压变化和煤层割理对气体渗透性的影响.

sentences.en: To supply , support , secure, or strengthen with a cleat.
sentences.cn: 把船固定在缆柱, 系索拴, 或夹板上.
